verbose_text: We observed similar trends in GFP-LC3 fluorescence when we treated embryos with various lysosomal or autophagic inhibitors (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY) : E64d and pepstatin A, which inhibit lysosomal proteases; and wortmannin, which inhibits the Class III phosphoinositide 3-kinase pathway, thereby preventing autophagosome formation XREF_BIBR.
evidence: pepstatin A, which inhibit lysosomal proteases
